casebody.data:
In the Matter of SARNOFF-IRVING HAT STORES, Inc., Bankrupt. IRVING TRUST COMPANY, as Trustee, etc., Appellant. No. 490. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 20, 1934.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court on authority of Perry v. Irving Trust Company, as Trustee, etc., 69 F.(2d) 90.
